CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 11, 1955, pg. 20, reads: "Lettermen Choose Ford - Henry (Model-T) Ford, center, last year's co-captain of the Pitt varsity football team, was chosen by the Pitt Lettermen's Club as the most valuable player on the varsity last season.  Ford received the handsome trophy, which he is holding, at the club's luncheon Monday at Hotel Webster Hall.  Ford is being congratulated by head Coach John Michelosen of Pitt, left, and new backfield coach, 'Vic' Fusia, right.  Ford has been drafted by the Cleveland Browns. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: University of Pittsburgh football coach John Michelosen, football player Henry "Model T" Ford holding his most valuable player trophy, and backfield coach "Vic" Fusia, in Hotel Webster Hall, Oakland
